title: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist even though it remains unchanged
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes are made.
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied, but no changes are actually made. Additionally, the code assist does not appear as expected.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes are made during code assist. Additionally, the code assist should appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press Ctrl + Space to trigger code assist.
